Definition.WordDefinition: suitable adj 1: suitable for the desired purpose; "Is this a suitable dress for the office?" 2: meant or adapted for an occasion or use; "a tractor suitable (or fit) for heavy duty"; "not an appropriate (or fit) time for flippancy" [syn: {appropriate}, {suited}] 3: appropriate for a condition or occasion; "everything in its proper place"; "the right man for the job"; "she is not suitable for the position" [syn: {proper}, {right}] 4: worthy of being chosen especially as a spouse; "the parents found the girl suitable for their son" [syn: {desirable}, {worthy}]
